name: Intentional Dung Beetle
description:
A simple little bullet a hell arcade game featuring a mind-controlled dung beetle!

Use the arrow keys to move and press Z to go through dialouge!

Tips:
-dung bullets (dunglets?) can't hurt you when you are powered up
-there is an ending if you get a score of 30 or over

Thank you for playing! :)
I would love to hear feedback and critisism in the comments, as well as your high scores.

Made for Wowie Game Jam 2
